content: we made new stylish crochet baby hoodie cardigan jacket for boys/girls 12-24 months size the pattern is so simple and easy you can easily to change the size as you want to make larger and smaller we explain in details about the sizes 0-3 months /6-12 months more explain for adult sizes explain patterns in my video tutorial below we add 3 different colors in this sweater you can chose any of other colors according to your taste we used light dk weight wool #4 yarn with 4mm g crochet hook for the project size of the jacket we mention below in the pattern this baby elegant hoodie jacket started bottom to top we add simple stitch for the pattern it s very easy to start so you can follow my other crochet ideas we mention links we add a beautiful super easy pattern worked together back and both fronts then divide shoulders hope you will like and appreciate
